plot: Dominican Movie about the tragic story of 4 friends who traveled from the US to the DR to shoot a documentary about ghosts. Unfortunately, some of them did not return home. The footage they captured tells the whole story.
title: Brujeria Fantasma
plot_es: Dominican Movie about the tragic story of 4 friends who traveled from the US to the DR to shoot a documentary about ghosts. Unfortunately, some of them did not return home. The footage they captured tells the whole story.
plot_en: Dominican Movie about the tragic story of 4 friends who traveled from the US to the DR to shoot a documentary about ghosts. Unfortunately, some of them did not return home. The footage they captured tells the whole story.
